PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Cisco Systems Inc.,                   San Jose, CA  
Senior Software Engineer (Engineering Automation Operation, NPI Testing)                                    2014 – Present 
Project: Platform AP operations - Co-Lead the team of 6 and led the operations for Cisco 8000 
• Optimization efforts using linear programming problem for 4 distributed routers, 4 fixed form factor routers to verify 
more than 500 test scenarios across 4 different software releases with more than 95% quality.

more than 500 test scenarios across 4 different software releases with more than 95% quality.

covering more than 20 different newly introduced PIDs. 
• Coded more than 2000 lines of python code, reviewed code for best quality of automation. 
• Optics planning effort  
• Managed more than 4 releases-based testing of more than 400 scenarios and achieved over 95% quality and 
uncovered most impactful software and hardware bugs.  
• Contributed to writing a white paper on Cisco 8000 routing platform’s benchmarking. 
• Documented the automated testing best practices using Cisco Code Factory infrastructure. 
• Mentored at least 10 software and hardware verification engineers and taught them strategic testing methodologies.

• Mentored at least 10 software and hardware verification engineers and taught them strategic testing methodologies.

• Exposure to Slurm based virtual machine farm load management and their debugging. 
• Daily reporting for 6 months achieved 100% pass rate.

engineers.
